___created_timestamp.descrption: When the optimization problem was created
___created_timestamp.title: Created Timestamp

___scheduled_for.descrption: An Unix Timestamp the Optimization Problem was scheduled for.
___scheduled_for.title: Scheduled For

___optimization_completed_timestamp.descrption: When the Optimization Problem was completed.
___optimization_completed_timestamp.title: Optimization Completed Timestamp

___links.descrption: Links to the GET operations for the optimization problem
___links.title: Links

___state.description: an optimization problem can be at one state at any given time (Initial = 1, MatrixProcessing = 2, Optimizing = 3, Optimized = 4, Error = 5, ComputingDirections = 6)
___state.title: State

___tracking_history.descrption: A collection of device tracking data with coordinates, speed, and timestamps
___tracking_history.title: TrackingHistory

___sent_to_background.descrption: If true it means the solution was not returned (it is being computed in the background)
___sent_to_background.title: Sent to Background
